name: sickle

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Sickle is a tool that uses sliding windows along with quality and length
thresholds to determine when quality is sufficiently low to trim the
3'-end of reads and also determines when the quality is sufficiently
high enough to trim the 5'-end of reads.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
